hint.en:
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline
1. When the state of Smart Plug (turn on or off the load) is changed: 1.Set Configuration parameter 0x03 to 0:Do not send Basic Report 2. Set Configuration parameter 0x03 to 1: Send Basic Report 3. Set Configuration parameter 0x03 to 2: Send Basic Report only when Load condition is changed not by Z-WAVE Command, such as short pressing. 2. Sending Meter Report.

instruction.en:
Press the Switch Button 3 times within 1.5s, Green LED is Blinking 3 times within 1 second.
If add Process is successful, Green LED will turn off.
instruction.de: Drücke die Schalter-Taste dreimal innerhalb von 1,5 Sekunden, die grüne LED blinkt dreimal innerhalb von 1 Sekunde. Wenn der Vorgang erfolgreich war, erlischt die grüne LED.
